page.title: 03HOLLY TREE RIDING SCHOOL
page.content: HOLLY TREE RIDING SCHOOL IS ONE OF THE FIVE FARMS IN THE PLUMLEY AREA,SPECIALISING IN BRINGING PLEASURE TO ALL AGE GROUPS,INCLUDING THE DISABLED.IT IS A VERY PROFITABLE BUSINESS AND THE OWNERS HAVE SEVERAL POLO PONIES.THE SON OF THE HOUSEHOLD HAS PLAYED POLO WITH MEMBERS OF THE ROYAL FAMILY. THE HORSES FOR RIDING ARE BOUGHT FROM REPUTABLE BREEDERS AND ARE FED ON HYDROPHONIC GRASS;A PRODUCT PRODUCED WHEN GRASS SEED IS PLACED IN A MACHINE WITH WATER AND DISSOLVED NUTRIENTS.FOUR DAYS LATER IT IS READY TO PROVIDE 14% PROTEIN FODDER,VERY ECONOMICALLY. THE FARM ITSELF IS VERY RICH IN HISTORY.TWENTY YEARS AGO A PRIEST WAS CALLED TO EXORCISE A GHOST FROM ONE OF THE STABLES,WHERE APPARENTLY,IN 1716,PEOPLE HAD BEEN HANGED.
